name: Dinari GBTC
description: The Dinari dShare token for Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC.d) represents a 1:1 backed token tied to shares of the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust. Each GBTC.d token is fully collateralized by a corresponding GBTC share held securely in a transparent treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, GBTC.d enables investors to access Grayscale Bitcoin Trust shares with enhanced flexibility, offering benefits such as 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and seamless transferability. Dinariâ€™s mission is to make investing in top-tier financial products like GBTC more accessible and efficient through tokenization.
